---
name: Security Vulnerability Report
about: Report a security vulnerability (not for public disclosure)
title: '[SECURITY] '
labels: ['security', 'triage']
assignees: []

---

⚠️ **DO NOT FILE PUBLIC ISSUES FOR SECURITY VULNERABILITIES**

If you are reporting a security vulnerability, please:

1. **Email us directly** at security@60sec.shop
2. **Or use HackerOne**: https://hackerone.com/60sec-shop

For more information, see our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md).

---

If you accidentally created this issue for a security matter:
- Close this issue immediately
- Follow the reporting instructions above

Thank you for helping keep our platform secure!
